statements: SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;

SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email IS NOT NULL;

SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT session_id, login_time, logout_time FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY login_time DESC;

SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT username, login_time FROM users JOIN user_sessions ON users.user_id = user_sessions.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(session_id) AS num_sessions FROM users LEFT JOIN user_sessions ON users.user_id = user_sessions.user_id GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, login_time FROM user_sessions WHERE login_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';

SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY email DESC;

SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON roles.role_id = user_roles.role_id;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_role_mappings m ON u.user_id = m.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON m.role_id = r.role_id JOIN user_permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id;

SELECT * FROM users;

SELECT role_name FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM user_role_assignment AS ur JOIN users AS u ON ur.user_id = u.user_id JOIN user_roles AS r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;

SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_role_assignment ON users.user_id = user_role_assignment.user_id;

SELECT user_id, username, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_role_assignment ON users.user_id = user_role_assignment.user_id JOIN user_roles_permissions ON user_role_assignment.role_id = user_roles_permissions.role_id JOIN user_permissions ON user_roles_permissions.permission_id = user_permissions.permission_id;
